# Grants
- BCS-Heart Research UK Clinical Fellowship Scheme (£16,000) \hfill December 2024
    - Co-applicant for Harefield Hospital to undertake a weekly site visit to the CMR Unit at Brigham and Womens' Hospital and Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachussets, USA, with the aim to familiarise with AI-powered, automated, accelerated cardiac MRI acquisition software
- Italian Ministry of Public Education (€ 299,604) \hfill July 2023
    - Participant to research unit in the ULTRALIGHT-HCM study, designed to perform deep cardiovascular phenotyping on athletes with left ventricular hypertrophy undergoing cardiac MRI and advanced genetic testing to identify features predictive of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
:::
